hey , can u pls seed this..such an amazing programme.. ilearnt a lot about life watching this programme... u gotta see the bigger picture of the world, not only your problem, relationship crap etc... man people are suffering... once u see that then you relalise how lucky you are... its an encouragement you to be a better person..visit Dhammatalks or listen to some talks by Thanissaro Bhikkhu and Ajahn braham on youtube
